mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_profiles ( firebase_uid, birth_date, gender, current_age, life_expectancy, marriage_year, career_insurance_type, biography, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{firebaseUid}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{currentAge}, #{lifeExpectancy}, #{marriageYear}, #{careerInsuranceType}, #{biography}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) > 0 FROM user_profiles WHERE firebase_uid = #{firebaseUid}
